scripts.ports:kill: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules **/node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm store prune && pnpm install
scripts.setup: pnpm install && echo 'Run: pnpm -C packages/server dev & pnpm -C packages/web dev'
scripts.docker:check: docker ps --format 'table {{.Names}}	{{.Status}}	{{.Ports}}' | grep -E '(postgres|redis|minio)' || echo 'No services running'
